meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in the intestines of humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The enterococcus in our intestines helps with digestion.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying the enterococcus bacteria to understand its role in our bodies.
meanings.sent3: The enterococcus in the intestines decided to throw a party for the other bacteria.
meanings.sent4: The enterococcus bacteria are like tiny workers in our gut, always busy.
meanings.sent5: Imagine a bustling city inside you, with enterococcus as the hardworking citizens.

meanings.definition: Any bacterium of the genus Enterococcus.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are researching the enterococcus for its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: There are different species of enterococcus that have varying effects.
meanings.sent3: The enterococcus from the lab seemed to have a mischievous gleam in its microscopic eye.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bacteria, enterococcus stands out like a bright star.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, enterococcus appears like a tiny, bustling community.
